Quote.Author: Nicola Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd love to be the Ali of women's boxing, to retire as the greatest

Quote.Author: Nicola Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: I wouldn't call myself a feminist. I am just me. I like boxing and acting and doing my charity work

Quote.Author: Nicola Formichetti
Quote.QuoteValue: Social networking inspires me a lot and how we are related and connected to each other

Quote.Author: Nicola Formichetti
Quote.QuoteValue: My muse is the digital world

Quote.Author: Nicola Formichetti
Quote.QuoteValue: The Internet shapes my life and work so completely that I couldn't imagine living without it

Quote.Author: Nicola Formichetti
Quote.QuoteValue: I live between Europe, America and Asia

Quote.Author: Nicola Formichetti
Quote.QuoteValue: I think when you start talking about money, it stops the whole creative process for me

Quote.Author: Nicola Formichetti
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm half-Japanese, so I collect toys, like a Yayoi Kusama stuffed pumpkin

Quote.Author: Nicola Formichetti
Quote.QuoteValue: I like places where you can dance to crazy music, like Bedlam or Eastern Bloc in the East Village

Quote.Author: Nicola Formichetti
Quote.QuoteValue: My mom was my muse - she would buy me Italian 'Vogue.' I was this little fashion boy

Quote.Author: Nicola Formichetti
Quote.QuoteValue: Japan, for me, will always be my inspiration source

Quote.Author: Nicola Formichetti
Quote.QuoteValue: I am terrible at making food. I love eating, but I can't make anything

Quote.Author: Nicola Sturgeon
Quote.QuoteValue: The importance of education is ingrained in Scottish history

Quote.Author: Nicola Sturgeon
Quote.QuoteValue: Any politician or campaigner trying to pull the wool over the eyes of the public won't get very far

Quote.Author: Nicola Sturgeon
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not opinion polls that determine the outcome of elections, it's votes in ballot boxes

Quote.Author: Nicola Sturgeon
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't cook very often. Actually, I'd go further: I can't cook

Quote.Author: Nicola Sturgeon
Quote.QuoteValue: I think you should always aim for more

Quote.Author: Nicola Sturgeon
Quote.QuoteValue: One of Ed Miliband's shadow ministers has said he would never vote for the renewal of Trident

Quote.Author: Nicola Sturgeon
Quote.QuoteValue: The decision on whether there is another referendum is down to the Scottish people

Quote.Author: Nicola Sturgeon
Quote.QuoteValue: I consider myself a selfie specialist

Quote.Author: Nicola Sturgeon
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a politician, and as you know, politicians are rarely very funny

Quote.Author: Nicola Sturgeon
Quote.QuoteValue: Haggis is delicious. It is wonderful. It's spicy, it's tasty, and you get vegetarian haggis as well

Quote.Author: Nicolas Chamfort
Quote.QuoteValue: There is a melancholy that stems from greatness

Quote.Author: Nicolas Chamfort
Quote.QuoteValue: There are more people who wish to be loved than there are who are willing to love

Quote.Author: Nicolas Chamfort
Quote.QuoteValue: Conviction is the conscience of the mind

Quote.Author: Nicolas Chamfort
Quote.QuoteValue: People are governed with the head; kindness of heart is little use in chess

Quote.Author: Nicolas Chamfort
Quote.QuoteValue: Swallow a toad in the morning and you will encounter nothing more disgusting the rest of the day

Quote.Author: Nicolas Chamfort
Quote.QuoteValue: The only thing that stops God from sending another flood is that the first one was useless

Quote.Author: Nicolas Chamfort
Quote.QuoteValue: The most wasted day of all is that on which we have not laughed

Quote.Author: Nicolas Chamfort
Quote.QuoteValue: There are well-dressed foolish ideas just as there are well-dressed fools

Quote.Author: Nicolas Chamfort
Quote.QuoteValue: One must not hope to be more than one can be

Quote.Author: Nicolas Chamfort
Quote.QuoteValue: Most books today seemed to have been written overnight from books read the day before

Quote.Author: Nicolas Roeg
Quote.QuoteValue: The rules are learnt in order to be broken, but if you don't know them, then something is missing

Quote.Author: Nicolas Roeg
Quote.QuoteValue: We're all influenced by everything unless we're locked in an empty room

Quote.Author: Nicolas Roeg
Quote.QuoteValue: Our lives are full of all the genres. Fear and hope and sadness

Quote.Author: Nicolas Roeg
Quote.QuoteValue: Men and women's needs and desires overlap but go in different directions as well

Quote.Author: Nicolas Roeg
Quote.QuoteValue: You cannot intellectualize yourself out of obsession. You cannot cure yourself of it

Quote.Author: Nicolas Roeg
Quote.QuoteValue: I like the probability of the impossible

Quote.Author: Nicolas Roeg
Quote.QuoteValue: I realized I've spent all my life creating a past

Quote.Author: Nicolas Roeg
Quote.QuoteValue: Children's finger-painting came under the arts, but movies didn't

Quote.Author: Nicolas Roeg
Quote.QuoteValue: Fear has many faces

Quote.Author: Nicolas Roeg
Quote.QuoteValue: In life, we all learn from everyone

Quote.Author: Nicolaus Copernicus
Quote.QuoteValue: Of all things visible, the highest is the heaven of the fixed stars

Quote.Author: Nicolaus Copernicus
Quote.QuoteValue: At rest, however, in the middle of everything is the sun

Quote.Author: Nicolaus Copernicus
Quote.QuoteValue: For I am not so enamoured of my own opinions that I disregard what others may think of them

Quote.Author: Nicolaus Copernicus
Quote.QuoteValue: Mathematics is written for mathematicians

Quote.Author: Nicolaus Copernicus
Quote.QuoteValue: Finally we shall place the Sun himself at the center of the Universe

Quote.Author: Nicolaus Copernicus
Quote.QuoteValue: First of all, we must note that the universe is spherical

Quote.Author: Nicolaus Copernicus
Quote.QuoteValue: The earth also is spherical, since it presses upon its center from every direction

Quote.Author: Nicolaus Copernicus
Quote.QuoteValue: Pouring forth its seas everywhere, then, the ocean envelops the earth and fills its deeper chasms

Quote.Author: Nicolaus Copernicus
Quote.QuoteValue: Near the sun is the center of the universe

Quote.Author: Nicolaus Copernicus
Quote.QuoteValue: In so many and such important ways, then, do the planets bear witness to the earth's mobility

Quote.Author: Nicole Ari Parker
Quote.QuoteValue: Exercise is about being grateful for the body you have and sustaining the life you have

Quote.Author: Nicole Ari Parker
Quote.QuoteValue: God loves you and everything about you, so why beat up on your precious self?

Quote.Author: Nicole Ari Parker
Quote.QuoteValue: One good step breeds another one

Quote.Author: Nicole Ari Parker
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody can tell you how to be a good wife or husband

Quote.Author: Nicole Ari Parker
Quote.QuoteValue: Being a parent is the hardest job ever in life

Quote.Author: Nicole Ari Parker
Quote.QuoteValue: I have friends struggling with autism, juvenile diabetes

Quote.Author: Nicole Ari Parker
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to work hard not to take your partner for granted, even when you are tired

Quote.Author: Nicole Ari Parker
Quote.QuoteValue: Take all the hype out of the exercise and think of it as brushing your teeth

Quote.Author: Nicole Ari Parker
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm really into nutrition from the inside out

Quote.Author: Nicole Ari Parker
Quote.QuoteValue: I enjoy using coconut oil - not only for my skin and hair, but I'll digest it

Quote.Author: Nicole Kidman
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't have to be naked to be sexy

Quote.Author: Nicole Kidman
Quote.QuoteValue: I find standing and posing for photos very awkward

Quote.Author: Nicole Kidman
Quote.QuoteValue: LIfe has got all those twists and turns. You've got to hold on tight and off you go

Quote.Author: Nicole Kidman
Quote.QuoteValue: I wouldn't want to be married to me, but luckily Tom Cruise does

Quote.Author: Nicole Kidman
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a different approach. I don't file lawsuits because I really don't care

Quote.Author: Nicole Kidman
Quote.QuoteValue: What's the point of doing something good if nobody's watching

Quote.Author: Nicole Kidman
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no drugs, no Tom in a dress, no psychiatrists

Quote.Author: Nicole Kidman
Quote.QuoteValue: You're not anyone in America unless you're on TV

Quote.Author: Nicole Kidman
Quote.QuoteValue: I refuse to let what happened to me make me bitter

Quote.Author: Nicole Kidman
Quote.QuoteValue: I just want to be nominated; beggars can't be choosers

Quote.Author: Nicole Polizzi
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't have regrets, there are only lessons. You learn from them, and you become a better person

Quote.Author: Nicole Polizzi
Quote.QuoteValue: Be sure of yourself, don't let anyone bully you, be a strong and independent woman or boy

Quote.Author: Nicole Polizzi
Quote.QuoteValue: You're going to have haters and you're going to have lovers

Quote.Author: Nicole Polizzi
Quote.QuoteValue: When you're tan, you feel better about yourself

Quote.Author: Nicole Polizzi
Quote.QuoteValue: Donald Trump, I would vote for him. Trump would make this country better I feel

Quote.Author: Nicole Polizzi
Quote.QuoteValue: If I do something stupid, which is pretty much the whole time, I hate it. I just hate it

Quote.Author: Nicole Polizzi
Quote.QuoteValue: It sucks, but no Long Islands or margaritas when you drink. It has to be straight vodka

Quote.Author: Nicole Polizzi
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm trying to build an empire, because after this, I cannot get a normal job

Quote.Author: Nicole Polizzi
Quote.QuoteValue: I have an education, I went to college, you know?

Quote.Author: Nicole Polizzi
Quote.QuoteValue: The only person I've had sex with on Jersey Shore is my boyfriend

Quote.Author: Nicole Richie
Quote.QuoteValue: You can see it right away when a person is dressing outside of who she is

Quote.Author: Nicole Richie
Quote.QuoteValue: I will be really happy once I have done my jail time. I can start fresh

Quote.Author: Nicole Richie
Quote.QuoteValue: I admire anyone with their own sense of personal style

Quote.Author: Nicole Richie
Quote.QuoteValue: I have olive skin, so if I get pale, I look green. I have to tan

Quote.Author: Nicole Richie
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a Virgo and I'm really good at scheduling. And I really make it work. I get up 6.30 every day

Quote.Author: Nicole Richie
Quote.QuoteValue: I think lingerie plays a big part in how you carry yourself

Quote.Author: Nicole Richie
Quote.QuoteValue: I owe the baby my life. I owe this baby everything and I have a responsibility now

Quote.Author: Nicole Richie
Quote.QuoteValue: Anytime I am around a male body part it is kind of exiting

Quote.Author: Nicole Richie
Quote.QuoteValue: I absolutely love Oscar. So classic. So timeless

Quote.Author: Nicole Richie
Quote.QuoteValue: When my dad divorced my mom it was kind of like him leaving me also

Quote.Author: Niecy Nash
Quote.QuoteValue: Falling in love was the easy part; planning a wedding - yikes!

Quote.Author: Niecy Nash
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a Gucci girl all the way

Quote.Author: Niecy Nash
Quote.QuoteValue: I have more energy to run after our four children. Weight loss and great skin were a bonus!

Quote.Author: Niecy Nash
Quote.QuoteValue: The adage 'a family that prays together, stays together' is so true

Quote.Author: Niecy Nash
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel like love is the thing we were created for, yet it's the place we struggle the most

Quote.Author: Niecy Nash
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't need to do a reality show to make my mark in this world

Quote.Author: Niecy Nash
Quote.QuoteValue: When you like what you like, it makes it easy for your husband to shop for you!

Quote.Author: Niecy Nash
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't get into this business for other people to know my name

Quote.Author: Niecy Nash
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't marry a man that wanted to be in the business. But that's why we're a perfect fit

Quote.Author: Niecy Nash
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a perfect mom, but I'm perfect for my kids

Quote.Author: Niels Bohr
Quote.QuoteValue: Your theory is crazy, but it's not crazy enough to be true

Quote.Author: Niels Bohr
Quote.QuoteValue: Never express yourself more clearly than you are able to think

Quote.Author: Niels Bohr
Quote.QuoteValue: Prediction is very difficult, especially if it's about the future

Quote.Author: Niels Bohr
Quote.QuoteValue: A physicist is just an atom's way of looking at itself

Quote.Author: Niels Bohr
Quote.QuoteValue: How wonderful that we have met with a paradox. Now we have some hope of making progress

Quote.Author: Niels Bohr
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything we call real is made of things that cannot be regarded as real

Quote.Author: Niels Bohr
Quote.QuoteValue: If quantum mechanics hasn't profoundly shocked you, you haven't understood it yet

Quote.Author: Niels Bohr
Quote.QuoteValue: There are some things so serious you have to laugh at them

Quote.Author: Niels Bohr
Quote.QuoteValue: Every sentence I utter must be understood not as an affirmation, but as a question

Quote.Author: Niels Bohr
Quote.QuoteValue: No, no, you're not thinking; you're just being logical

Quote.Author: Nigel Farage
Quote.QuoteValue: It's a European Union of economic failure, of mass unemployment and of low growth

Quote.Author: Nigel Farage
Quote.QuoteValue: I think frankly when it comes to chaos you ain't seen nothing yet

Quote.Author: Nigel Farage
Quote.QuoteValue: I think that politics needs a bit of spicing up

Quote.Author: Nigel Farage
Quote.QuoteValue: We must break up the eurozone. We must set those Mediterranean countries free

Quote.Author: Nigel Farage
Quote.QuoteValue: It's hardly a radical idea to suggest that regulators and legislators understand the law now, is it?

Quote.Author: Nigel Farage
Quote.QuoteValue: When an Occupy demo in the centre of Frankfurt makes world news, I shall hurry to join in

Quote.Author: Nigel Farage
Quote.QuoteValue: It's the FSA and its plethora of EU bodies that's failed

Quote.Author: Nigel Farage
Quote.QuoteValue: British chancellor is telling the rest of Europe it must abandon democracy. It's appalling

Quote.Author: Nigel Farage
Quote.QuoteValue: It's amazing how ideas start out, isn't it?

Quote.Author: Nigel Farage
Quote.QuoteValue: If an idea is indeed sensible, it will eventually become just part of the accepted wisdom

Quote.Author: Nigel Lawson
Quote.QuoteValue: We already have a sabbatical system. It's called opposition, and I've had enough of it

Quote.Author: Nigel Lawson
Quote.QuoteValue: To govern is to choose. To appear to be unable to choose is to appear to be unable to govern

Quote.Author: Nigel Lawson
Quote.QuoteValue: The Treasury has enough trouble with forecasts even when they are trying to get them right

Quote.Author: Nigel Lawson
Quote.QuoteValue: The NHS is the closest thing the English have to a religion

Quote.Author: Nigel Lawson
Quote.QuoteValue: Britain's destiny lies in Europe

Quote.Author: Nigel Lawson
Quote.QuoteValue: In terms of the arguments, I think the pro-Leave campaign is winning them all

Quote.Author: Nigel Lawson
Quote.QuoteValue: Most of the countries in the world are outside the E.U., and they are doing very nicely, thank you

Quote.Author: Nigel Lawson
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't need to be within the single market to trade; it's not an issue

Quote.Author: Nigel Lawson
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think the government needs to be frightened of the banks in the slightest

Quote.Author: Nigel Lawson
Quote.QuoteValue: I am in favour of a fully transferable allowance

Quote.Author: Nigella Lawson
Quote.QuoteValue: Emotion is messy, contradictory... and true

Quote.Author: Nigella Lawson
Quote.QuoteValue: It sounds like something on a very trite T-shirt, but life is what happens

Quote.Author: Nigella Lawson
Quote.QuoteValue: There is a kind of euphoria of grief, a degree of madness

Quote.Author: Nigella Lawson
Quote.QuoteValue: There is something wrong about being photographed that has nothing to do with vanity

Quote.Author: Nigella Lawson
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't go around grieving all the time, but the grief is still there and always will be

Quote.Author: Nigella Lawson
Quote.QuoteValue: On the whole, I prefer Christmas as an adult than I did as a child

Quote.Author: Nigella Lawson
Quote.QuoteValue: I was a quiet teenager, introverted, full of angst

Quote.Author: Nigella Lawson
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't believe in low-fat cooking

Quote.Author: Nigella Lawson
Quote.QuoteValue: I never have plans for the future as you never know how things will turn out

Quote.Author: Nigella Lawson
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like conflict

Quote.Author: Nik Wallenda
Quote.QuoteValue: One of the things I enjoy is the challenge of Mother Nature

Quote.Author: Nik Wallenda
Quote.QuoteValue: I hope what I do and what I just did inspires people around the world to reach for the skies

Quote.Author: Nik Wallenda
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd love to come to Australia. I'd love to walk about the Sydney Opera House

Quote.Author: Nik Wallenda
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel like I'm on cloud nine right now

Quote.Author: Nik Wallenda
Quote.QuoteValue: I've trained all my life not to be distracted by distractions

Quote.Author: Nik Wallenda
Quote.QuoteValue: It's about carrying on the legacy and doing something I love and have a passion for

Quote.Author: Nik Wallenda
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of praying helped me a lot

Quote.Author: Nik Wallenda
Quote.QuoteValue: I am so blessed. How blessed I am to have the life that I have

Quote.Author: Nik Wallenda
Quote.QuoteValue: I was not scared at all

Quote.Author: Nik Wallenda
Quote.QuoteValue: I do everything I do to pay tribute to my great-grandfather

Quote.Author: Nikita Khrushchev
Quote.QuoteValue: If you live among wolves you have to act like a wolf

Quote.Author: Nikita Khrushchev
Quote.QuoteValue: But life is a great school. It thrashes and bangs and teaches you

Quote.Author: Nikita Khrushchev
Quote.QuoteValue: The press is our chief ideological weapon

Quote.Author: Nikita Khrushchev
Quote.QuoteValue: We say the name of God, but that is only habit

Quote.Author: Nikita Khrushchev
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to talk to these people because they stay in power and you change all the time

Quote.Author: Nikita Khrushchev
Quote.QuoteValue: The more bombers, the less room for doves of peace

Quote.Author: Nikita Khrushchev
Quote.QuoteValue: If one cannot catch a bird of paradise, better take a wet hen

Quote.Author: Nikita Khrushchev
Quote.QuoteValue: Economics is a subject that does not greatly respect one's wishes

Quote.Author: Nikita Khrushchev
Quote.QuoteValue: Politicians are the same all over. They promise to build bridges even when there are no rivers

Quote.Author: Nikita Khrushchev
Quote.QuoteValue: Whether you like it or not, history is on our side. We will bury you!

Quote.Author: Nikki Cox
Quote.QuoteValue: I still don't know quite what I'm supposed to do or be

Quote.Author: Nikki Cox
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I'm as content as one can be

Quote.Author: Nikki Cox
Quote.QuoteValue: If I didn't have fake nails, my fingers would be bloody stumps

Quote.Author: Nikki Cox
Quote.QuoteValue: Mary and I look eerily similar but other than that, the differences are pretty much night and day

Quote.Author: Nikki Cox
Quote.QuoteValue: To be perfectly honest, drama is a lot simpler than comedy

Quote.Author: Nikki Cox
Quote.QuoteValue: When all of a sudden, people say, 'Wow, you look nice,' and carry on, it's shocking. Really awkward

Quote.Author: Nikki Cox
Quote.QuoteValue: For me, I've worked hard for people to think I'm funny

Quote.Author: Nikki Cox
Quote.QuoteValue: There is just so very much I can't do. I don't drive, for one

Quote.Author: Nikki Cox
Quote.QuoteValue: I learned how but I have a terrible paranoia and fear. I do not drive an automobile

Quote.Author: Nikki Cox
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a McDonald's girl - several times a week. Usually the two-cheeseburger combo meal

Quote.Author: Nikki Giovanni
Quote.QuoteValue: For most of my life, I've thought of myself as pretty cool

Quote.Author: Nikki Giovanni
Quote.QuoteValue: We write because we believe the human spirit cannot be tamed and should not be trained

Quote.Author: Nikki Giovanni
Quote.QuoteValue: Art is not for the cultivated taste. It is to cultivate taste

Quote.Author: Nikki Giovanni
Quote.QuoteValue: If you don't understand yourself you don't understand anybody else

Quote.Author: Nikki Giovanni
Quote.QuoteValue: Follow your image as far as you can no matter how useless you think it is. Push yourself

Quote.Author: Nikki Giovanni
Quote.QuoteValue: Some say we are responsible for those we love. Others know we are responsible for those who love us

Quote.Author: Nikki Giovanni
Quote.QuoteValue: Mistakes are a fact of life. It is the response to the error that counts

Quote.Author: Nikki Giovanni
Quote.QuoteValue: Now, everything I do, I do because I want to. And I believe the best is yet to come

Quote.Author: Nikki Giovanni
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything will change. The only question is growing up or decaying

Quote.Author: Nikki Giovanni
Quote.QuoteValue: There are things you stand up for because it's right

Quote.Author: Nikki Haley
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone can have a bad day

Quote.Author: Nikki Haley
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a huge fan of women; I think we're great

Quote.Author: Nikki Haley
Quote.QuoteValue: We don't have unions in South Carolina because we don't need unions in South Carolina

Quote.Author: Nikki Haley
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not going to stop beating up on the Democrats for wasteful spending

Quote.Author: Nikki Haley
Quote.QuoteValue: I wear heels. It's not for a fashion statement, it's... ammunition

Quote.Author: Nikki Haley
Quote.QuoteValue: I think any label is bad. I'm more than a label

Quote.Author: Nikki Haley
Quote.QuoteValue: All of my policy is not based on a label. It's based on what I lived and what I know

Quote.Author: Nikki Haley
Quote.QuoteValue: This is America. Anyone is free to protest about anything they want

Quote.Author: Nikki Haley
Quote.QuoteValue: Contraception doesn't define a woman

Quote.Author: Nikki Haley
Quote.QuoteValue: God bless the people of the State of South Carolina

Quote.Author: Nikki Reed
Quote.QuoteValue: I learned how to change a cloth diaper on a raccoon. I was maybe 8 or 9

Quote.Author: Nikki Reed
Quote.QuoteValue: If I had more confidence, I would rock a crop top

Quote.Author: Nikki Reed
Quote.QuoteValue: My name is not big enough for people to go, 'Let me throw money at you because you're so famous!'

Quote.Author: Nikki Reed
Quote.QuoteValue: Some of the greatest moments in life come from moments that are incomplete

Quote.Author: Nikki Reed
Quote.QuoteValue: Part of being young is making mistakes

Quote.Author: Nikki Reed
Quote.QuoteValue: We live in a world where sort of nothing is shocking anymore

Quote.Author: Nikki Reed
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always loved music and felt connected to it, but was too afraid to explore that avenue

Quote.Author: Nikki Reed
Quote.QuoteValue: People send everyone hate mail. That's the way the world works right now, I'm nothing special

Quote.Author: Nikki Reed
Quote.QuoteValue: For some reason, young girls, they don't want the guy that's just there

Quote.Author: Nikki Reed
Quote.QuoteValue: When you date someone who loves the outdoors, it's inspiring

Quote.Author: Nikki Sixx
Quote.QuoteValue: I forgive my mom for being a psycho and my dad for being a loser

Quote.Author: Nikki Sixx
Quote.QuoteValue: If you don't deal with your demons, they will deal with you, and it's gonna hurt

Quote.Author: Nikki Sixx
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't pee like a puppy if you wanna run with the big dogs

Quote.Author: Nikki Sixx
Quote.QuoteValue: We each have our own tour bus. We've never done that before

Quote.Author: Nikki Sixx
Quote.QuoteValue: Motley Crue, collectively and individually, have done things on our own terms

Quote.Author: Nikki Sixx
Quote.QuoteValue: You want to love unconditionally everything you do, or don't do it

Quote.Author: Nikki Sixx
Quote.QuoteValue: People say I have a distorted lens. I think I see things as they really are

Quote.Author: Nikki Sixx
Quote.QuoteValue: Let me explain something: I'm not incredibly rich

Quote.Author: Nikki Sixx
Quote.QuoteValue: As a lyricist, I'm really trying to raise my level of quality

Quote.Author: Nikki Sixx
Quote.QuoteValue: One thing I've always loved doing is hanging out and talking music with other artists

Quote.Author: Niklas Zennstrom
Quote.QuoteValue: We also have a conference call feature where up to five people can talk on one Skype call

Quote.Author: Niklas Zennstrom
Quote.QuoteValue: If you can use a Web browser, you can use Skype

Quote.Author: Niklas Zennstrom
Quote.QuoteValue: We have 2 million users in the U.S. and about 13 million worldwide in more than 200 countries

Quote.Author: Niklas Zennstrom
Quote.QuoteValue: They also can combine voice with instant messaging and online file sharing

Quote.Author: Niklas Zennstrom
Quote.QuoteValue: Skype is for any individual who has a broadband Internet connection

Quote.Author: Niklas Zennstrom
Quote.QuoteValue: In fact, we just surpassed our first 1 million simultaneous users online

Quote.Author: Niklas Zennstrom
Quote.QuoteValue: And the VCR did the same thing: the movie industry thought nobody would ever watch movies any more

Quote.Author: Niklas Zennstrom
Quote.QuoteValue: As an entrepreneur, if you're the originator, you need to be faster than ever

Quote.Author: Niklas Zennstrom
Quote.QuoteValue: Talent can pop up anywhere in the world, it's not just one city block

Quote.Author: Niklas Zennstrom
Quote.QuoteValue: Today as an entrepreneur you have more options

Quote.Author: Nikolaj Coste
Quote.QuoteValue: aldau - I think advice is cheap. You can only really learn by doing and making mistakes

Quote.Author: Nikolaj Coste
Quote.QuoteValue: aldau - It's beautiful being out in the wild

Quote.Author: Nikolaj Coste
Quote.QuoteValue: aldau - I try not to regret too much. I find that feeling guilty takes up so much of my time already

Quote.Author: Nikolaj Coste
Quote.QuoteValue: aldau - The more secrets and twists in a character, the better

Quote.Author: Nikolaj Coste
Quote.QuoteValue: aldau - A villain to me is someone who actively seeks to hurt someone or does things for his own gain

Quote.Author: Nikolaj Coste
Quote.QuoteValue: aldau - I love team sports

Quote.Author: Nikolaj Coste
Quote.QuoteValue: aldau - If you look at most of the Royal Houses in Europe, the inbreeding was pretty outstanding

Quote.Author: Nikolaj Coste
Quote.QuoteValue: aldau - I think we all have the capacity of evil in us

Quote.Author: Nikolaj Coste
Quote.QuoteValue: aldau - I like to wear beautiful clothes, but I don't have that many

Quote.Author: Nikolaj Coste
Quote.QuoteValue: aldau - There's something liberating about watching someone not following the rules

Quote.Author: Nikos Kazantzakis
Quote.QuoteValue: In order to succeed, we must first believe that we can

Quote.Author: Nikos Kazantzakis
Quote.QuoteValue: The real meaning of enlightenment is to gaze with undimmed eyes on all darkness

Quote.Author: Nikos Kazantzakis
Quote.QuoteValue: Let your youth have free reign. It won't come again, so be bold, and no repenting

Quote.Author: Nikos Kazantzakis
Quote.QuoteValue: I said to the almond tree, 'Friend, speak to me of God,' and the almond tree blossomed

Quote.Author: Nikos Kazantzakis
Quote.QuoteValue: Every perfect traveler always creates the country where he travels

Quote.Author: Nikos Kazantzakis
Quote.QuoteValue: Beauty is merciless. You do not look at it, it looks at you and does not forgive

Quote.Author: Nikos Kazantzakis
Quote.QuoteValue: My entire soul is a cry, and all my work is a commentary on that cry

Quote.Author: Nikos Kazantzakis
Quote.QuoteValue: One of man's greatest obligations is anger

Quote.Author: Nikos Kazantzakis
Quote.QuoteValue: There is only one woman in the world. One woman, with many faces

Quote.Author: Nikos Kazantzakis
Quote.QuoteValue: Behind each woman rises the austere, sacred and mysterious face of Aphrodite

Quote.Author: Nile Rodgers
Quote.QuoteValue: Bands always call me when they are in need of a boost and I come in and put them back on top

Quote.Author: Nile Rodgers
Quote.QuoteValue: Art is something that opens up and enhances your emotions and that's what I like to think I'm doing

Quote.Author: Nile Rodgers
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a record producer and songwriter; I'm a problem-solver

Quote.Author: Nile Rodgers
Quote.QuoteValue: I've found great solace in finally taking care of myself and others

Quote.Author: Nile Rodgers
Quote.QuoteValue: I've had insomnia since I was five years old. I just don't require much sleep. I'm never tired

Quote.Author: Nile Rodgers
Quote.QuoteValue: You can fool a person into going to see a movie with a good trailer

Quote.Author: Nile Rodgers
Quote.QuoteValue: It was actually my partner, Bernard Edwards, who helped me develop my sort of funky jazz style

Quote.Author: Nile Rodgers
Quote.QuoteValue: My life was really interesting before 'Chic.'
